DOC.brief_title: Effects Hypertonic Saline Solution ( NACL 3 % +NAHCO3 ) Nasal Inflammation Children With AR . RinASol- Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Clinical history Allergic Rhinitis ( least 1 year ) 6 year old ≤ child age ≤ 14 year old Total Symptom Score 5 : > 5 last 4 day screen . Exclusion Criteria Signs acute infection upper low respiratory tract . Metabolic , immunological , systemic disease Respiratory tract deformity Systemic/Topical therapy antibiotic corticosteroids previous 30 day . Active smoker .
